mesquite.lib

Class ChartWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.MesquiteWindow
      • mesquite.lib.ChartWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Commandable, FileDirtier, Listable, Logger, OwnedByModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PairsWindow

    public abstract class ChartWindow
extends MesquiteWindow
    Chart windows can subclass this. Provides standard versions of some methods..

      • resetTitle

        public void resetTitle()
        When called the window will determine its own title. MesquiteWindows need to be self-titling so that when things change (names of files, tree blocks, etc.) they can reset their titles properly
        Specified by:
        resetTitle in class MesquiteWindow
